document_api_meta.title: Create Custom Engagement Task
document_api_meta.env_desc:
Create an engagement task that uses a self-defined custom message instead of predefined message templates from TikTok Shop. The task acts as a container for grouping messages with similar content and rules, allowing sellers to track and compare task performance across different types of content.
Note that each task has a mandatory end time, and once expired, it cannot be used to send additional messages.

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The seller access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 0. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a344ddec3030b238fa0) to get seller access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_query_param.name: idempotency_key
request_query_param.desc:
A unique key to recognize a request and prevent duplicate processing of the same request, especially in cases of connection issues. Ensure this key is unique for each request to avoid accidental duplicates.
Note: We recommend that you generate v4 UUIDs for use as keys.

request_query_param.name: shop_cipher
request_query_param.desc:
Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response. 
Get by API [Get Authorization Shop](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9?external_id=6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9)

request_body_param.name: end_time
request_body_param.desc: The time at which the task ends, and messages will no longer be sent. Unix timestamp (seconds).

request_body_param.name: channel
request_body_param.desc: The engagement channel. Only `TIKTOK_IM` is supported.

request_body_param.name: product_ids
request_body_param.desc:
The product IDs that you want to include as interactive cards in the message. Retrieve this value from the [Search Products API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/65854ffb8f559302d8a6acda).
Max count: 4

request_body_param.name: coupon_ids
request_body_param.desc:
The coupon IDs that you want to include as interactive cards in the message. 
Max count: 1
You can only add coupons that have one of these sets of property:
- `coupons.display_type=REGULAR` and `coupons.target_buyer_segment=ALL`
- `coupons.display_type=REGULAR` and `coupons.target_buyer_segment=REPEAT_CUSTOMERS`.
Find out the coupon ID and properties from the [Search Coupons API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6699dcdf115ebe02f841e4cd).

request_body_param.name: custom_message
request_body_param.desc: The custom message to send to customers.

request_body_param.name: ^title
request_body_param.desc:
The message title. 
- Valid format: plain text, unicode emoji (UTF-8)
- Valid length: [1, 70]

request_body_param.name: ^body
request_body_param.desc:
The message body.
- Valid format: plain text, unicode emoji (UTF-8)
- Valid length:  [1, 500]

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

response_param.name: ^task_id
response_param.desc: The unique identifier for the customer engagement task. Pass this value in the [Send Engagement Message API](67777e448e882e030d29676e) to associate the task with the message sending operation.

error_code_list.msg: Policy violation. The message contains content that violates TikTok Shop policies. Modify it and try again.
You're currently ineligible to send customized messages. Please use a message template.
Access denied. This endpoint is not available for this shop as the seller does not meet the access criteria for CRM features. See TikTok Shop Academy for details.
Failed to create an engagement task. Error details:

sample_code.label: Curl
Go
sample_code.value:
// For more details about the SDK, refer to the documentation:
// https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/67c83e0799a75104986ae498
func customerEngagement202502CreateCustomEngagementTaskPost() {
    configuration := apis.NewConfiguration()
    configuration.AddAppInfo(appKey, appSecret)
    apiClient := apis.NewAPIClient(configuration)
    request := apiClient.CustomerEngagementV202502API.CustomerEngagement202502EngagementTasksCustomPost(context.Background())
    request = request.XTtsAccessToken("your access token")
    request = request.ContentType("application/json")
    request = request.IdempotencyKey("372dd4e7-9c02-ddb0-d14b-0b23ce54e142")
    request = request.ShopCipher("your shop cipher")
    customerEngagement202502CreateCustomEngagementTaskRequestBody := customerEngagement_v202502.NewCustomerEngagement202502CreateCustomEngagementTaskRequestBody()
    customerEngagement202502CreateCustomEngagementTaskRequestBody.SetTaskName("Task1 for mega sale\n")
    customerEngagement202502CreateCustomEngagementTaskRequestBody.SetEndTime(1744344885)
    customerEngagement202502CreateCustomEngagementTaskRequestBody.SetChannel("TIKTOK_IM")
    customerEngagement202502CreateCustomEngagementTaskRequestBodyProductIdsList := []string{"8.646958016719848e+18"}
    customerEngagement202502CreateCustomEngagementTaskRequestBody.SetProductIds(customerEngagement202502CreateCustomEngagementTaskRequestBodyProductIdsList)
    customerEngagement202502CreateCustomEngagementTaskRequestBodyCouponIdsList := []string{"8.646958016219849e+18"}
    customerEngagement202502CreateCustomEngagementTaskRequestBody.SetCouponIds(customerEngagement202502CreateCustomEngagementTaskRequestBodyCouponIdsList)
    customerEngagement202502CreateCustomEngagementTaskRequestBodyCustomMessage := customerEngagement_v202502.NewCustomerEngagement202502CreateCustomEngagementTaskRequestBodyCustomMessage()
    customerEngagement202502CreateCustomEngagementTaskRequestBodyCustomMessage.SetTitle("Message title ")
    customerEngagement202502CreateCustomEngagementTaskRequestBodyCustomMessage.SetBody("Message body")
    customerEngagement202502CreateCustomEngagementTaskRequestBody.SetCustomMessage(*customerEngagement202502CreateCustomEngagementTaskRequestBodyCustomMessage)
    request = request.CustomerEngagement202502CreateCustomEngagementTaskRequestBody(*customerEngagement202502CreateCustomEngagementTaskRequestBody)
    resp, httpResp, err := request.Execute()
    if err != nil || httpResp.StatusCode != 200 {
        fmt.Printf("productsRequest err:%v resbody:%s", err, httpResp.Body)
        return
    }
    if resp == nil {
        fmt.Printf("response is nil")
        return
    }
    if resp.GetCode()!= 0 {
        fmt.Printf("response business is error, errorCode:%d errorMessage:%s", resp.GetCode(), resp.GetMessage())
        return
    }
    respDataJson, _ := json.MarshalIndent(resp.GetData(), "", "  ")
    fmt.Println("response data:", string(respDataJson))
    return
}

Java
